title: Disney Ousts Top TV Executive Peter Rice; Peter Rice, who was one of Disney's top television executives, joined the company in 2017 as part of its acquisition of entertainment assets from 21st Century Fox
text:
Dana Walden, another former Fox executive who currently serves as chairman of entertainment for Disney Television, will succeed Mr. Rice, the company said.

This article will be updated.

Disney Ousts Top TV Executive Peter Rice
